members.name: isLegacy
members.comment: Returns whether the client is using an older version that doesn't support all of the features in PaperServerListPingEvent. For Vanilla, this returns true for all clients older than 1.7.

return: true if the client is using legacy ping

name: com.destroystokyo.paper.network.StatusClient
comment: Represents a client requesting the current status from the server (e.g. from the server list).
